title: theHunter: Call of the Wild – Complete Collection – v2175916 + 34 DLCs
body:
theHunter: Call of the Wild – Complete Collection – v2175916 + 34 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Sports, Open world, Hunting, First-person, 3D
Companies: Expansive Worlds, Avalanche Studios, astragon Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 38.8 GB
Repack Size: 17.6 GB

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on theHunter.Call.of.the.Wild.Mississippi.Acres.Preserve-CODEX ISO release: codex-thehunter.call.of.the.wild.mississippi.acres.preserve.iso (41,656,647,680 bytes)
  • Game version: v2175916, 34 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 38.8 to 17.6 GB)
  • Installation takes from 12 to 35 minutes, depending on your config
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 67.3 GB (up to 70.3 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Never before have you experienced a hunting game like theHunter: Call of the Wild. Plunge into an atmospheric open world, teeming with life: from the majestic true-to-life animals to the rustling of leaves above you as you stalk your prey. You can decide to hunt on your own or join up and hunt together with friends. Just remember, you are not just a visitor in this world, you are a living and breathing part of it. As you finally spot the majestic crown of your first red deer through the brush, the feeling is indescribable.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous theHunter repacks.
